ai-patthana14.11:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.11:1.1_0: Judging is a condition for the world.
ai-patthana14.11:2.1_0: Neither understands the world is a condition for the world.
ai-patthana14.11:2.1_1: Neither sees the world is a condition for the world.
ai-patthana14.11:2.1_2: (This should be expanded as for the world.)
ai-patthana14.11:3.1_0: (Contact is a condition for the world.)
ai-patthana14.11:4.1_0: (These five discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
